title: PlaneProjection
body: PlaneProjection with Storyboard animations is presently unusable when any of the Rotation properties are applied (RotationX, RotationY, RotationZ).

comments.body: Thank you for reporting this issue. I followed up with the team and we believe that this issue has been fixed in the latest public insider builds. Do you still hit this issue if you are running the latest windows insider build (ie. build number 18346+)?
